prod_short_desc: Charge Axl into battle against the three fearsome brothers!
prod_long_desc:
Play out endless LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ battle scenes as Axl takes on the three ancient Stone monsters to stop them terrorizing Knighton, featuring a rolling monster vehicle with a giant face and chomping jaws, and a rear firing catapult. Includes two scannable shields and three minifigures.
Build Rumble, the rolling monster and his brothers, before bringing chaos to the kingdom!
As featured in Cartoon Network's LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ series
Includes Axl, Roog and Reex minifigures
LEGO NEXO KNIGHTS building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Rumble is over 4” high, 8” long and 6” wide
266 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 8 and 14 years old
